title: Palatial Private Pool Villas with 24-Hour Butler Service
description: Discover Canggu, Bali’s coolest beachfront destination known for its chic coffee shops, fashionable boutiques and picturesque rice paddies. Spend five or seven nights in a huge Private Pool Villa at Saba Villas - perfect for couples, families or groups or friends looking for a relaxing escape. Includes daily a la carte breakfast, daily afternoon tea, two three-course dinners, 60-minute traditional Balinese massage, return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Jalan Subak Sari No.30, Banjar Tegal Gundul, Canggu, North Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Canggu Private Pool Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience Bali's coolest beachfront destination when you stay at Lalasa Villas in Canggu, a picturesque coastal village hugging the island's south coast. Just 12 stunning private pool villas make up this breathtaking resort. Balance days of relaxation sequestered away within your private pool villa haven with authentic Balinese cuisine from the street-front Kecambah Resto and Café eatery or rejuvenating your body and soul at Lalasa Spa.

Often referred to as ‘the new Seminyak’, the ultra-stylish area of Canggu is regarded as one of Bali’s most popular hotspots. Located on the coast just 20 minutes from Seminyak, Canggu is home to a vibrant surf beach (a five-minute walk or shuttle from the villas) and happening strips lined with trendy coffee shops, chic clothing boutiques and cool bars like Finns Beach Club. The area’s stunning landscape is covered in a lush carpet of rice paddies dotted with some of Bali’s most stylish all-villa resorts and boutique properties - including Lalasa Villas self-contained sanctuaries.
offer_address: Jl. Pemelisan Agung Pantai Berawa No.12, Canggu, Kuta, Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Canggu Boutique Beachside Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover a quintessential Bali escape at this laid-back boutique resort, perfectly placed between stylish cafes, happening beach clubs and the warm sands of Nelayan Beach. Surrounded by rainforest foliage and featuring eclectic designer flourishes in bamboo, polished cement and teak, there’s no finer place to discover Canggu’s best.

This resort has everything you need to kick back in paradise, including a relaxed brunch spot and onsite coffee roastery at ZIN Cafe. ZINFIT is one of the island’s finest cycling and fitness studios. Spend your days savouring Canggu’s beloved beach clubs, then return to your resort with a spectacular central pool, spa treatments, tropical cocktails and plenty of fun in the sun.
offer_address: Jalan Nelayan 78, Canggu, Kecamatan Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie
title: Brand-New Canggu Treetop Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquility of a secluded tropical paradise with a stay in a luxurious, brand-new private pool villa in lush Canggu. Just 15 minutes from Bali's vibrant Seminyak, where beach clubs, trendy cafes and eclectic boutiques abound, this villa resort provides a serene escape from the island's bustling hotspots.

Relax in your private one-bedroom villa, featuring a unique plunge pool surrounded by a sun-dappled terrace with cozy sunbeds - perfect for enjoying a refreshing Bintang. Experience the full charm of Bali without leaving the resort: start your day with a delightful floating breakfast in the pool, savour delicious meals in the comfort of your villa and watch the sunset with a complimentary signature cocktail.

Enjoy easy access to the lively areas of Canggu and Batu Belig Beach, where an array of beach clubs, restaurants and retail hubs await. Return to your romantic villa for rejuvenation with a massage, floral decorations on plush bedding or a glass of wine in the bathtub.
location_description: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Gg. Anggrek VI No.8A, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Wellness Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Activities
description: Be among the first to recharge your mind, body and soul at Escape Ritual - an ultra-luxurious wellness retreat in Bali’s Canggu. Choose from five retreats - Air, Fire, Earth, Water and Space - and immerse yourself in all-inclusive daily activities, all-inclusive healthy meals and private return airport transfers from Denpasar Airport.
offer_address: Jl. Griya Mas No.3, Tumbak Bayuh, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Boutique Bali Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Tropical Temptation Beach Club Entry
description: Live out your Bali villa dreams with a stay at this serene retreat, nestled in the heart of Canggu. These luxury villas offers a unique blend of modern comforts and traditional Balinese charm, with everything you need for a relaxing stay: think plush bedding, private pools, spacious living areas and bathtubs. Savour the delights of local cuisine at nearby Warung Dandelion, or visit the sacred Tanah Lot Temple, just a short drive away. Beach bums can venture out to explore the world-renowned surf breaks of Echo Beach, or find a perch at a beach club perched along the beautiful Canggu coastline.
offer_address: Jalan Danau Batur Gg. Mangga VIII No.88, Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Bali Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Two Lunches or Dinners
description:
Live out your Bali villa dreams from this serene retreat in tranquil Canggu. Locally sourced materials and elegant furnishings adorn each spacious villa, where private pools, expansive living areas and gorgeous standalone bathtubs await. Perfect for both couples and families, this property has everything you need to elevate your Balinese escape.

Relish the delights of local cuisine at nearby Warung Dandelion. At the same time, beach bums can venture out to explore the world-renowned  Echo Beach, or find a nook at a beach club along the beautiful Canggu coastline and sip on refreshing cocktails while soaking up the vibrant atmosphere.
offer_address: Jalan Danau Batur Gg. Mangga VIII No.88, Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Romantic Canggu Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast & Two Lunches or Dinners
description: Discover one of Canggu’s best-kept secrets, with a stay at this stylish villa. Nestled in southwest Bali, this romantic haven offers a soothing refuge, framed by the lush foliage and rolling green hills that the region is renowned for. Elevating traditional Balinese design with polished wood accents and soothing greenery, each villa is unbelievably spacious and backed by the resort’s unrivalled hospitality. Beyond the villa, explore the endless nearby beaches, Melbourne-inspired cafes and lively beach clubs that have made Canggu the place to be.
offer_address: Gg. Semar No.8, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Suites on Canggu's Vibrant Beachfront
description: Experience Canggu: Bali’s coolest beachfront destination known for its chic coffee shops, fashionable boutiques and picturesque rice paddies-in timeless elegance at the five-star LV8 Resort Hotel. Enjoy a five or seven-night getaway in a spacious suite and indulge with daily buffet breakfast, daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktail each, two decadent dinners, a two-course lunch and a guaranteed late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: Canggu 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Discover Bali's Hottest Destination with Daily Dining Inclusions & Cocktails
description: Experience Canggu: Bali’s coolest beachfront destination known for its chic coffee shops, fashionable boutiques and picturesque rice paddies. Holiday like a celebrity at Sense Canggu Beach Hotel, perfectly located just minutes from the iconic Echo Beach. Enjoy daily breakfast, a three-course dinner during your stay, daily cocktails, daily afternoon tea, a one-way airport transfer and a leisurely late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: Jl. Munduk Kedungu No.55s, Pererenan, Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia

title: Canggu: Private Pool Villa Paradise in Bali
description: Leave it all behind for an authentic Balinese experience at The Santai Umalas Bali, a collection of pristine private pool villas with 24-hour butler service set in a serene location dotted with lush rice terraces and temples, just a 15-minute drive from the bright lights of Seminyak or Canggu. Escape with friends or a family for a relaxing stay in a spacious two or three-bedroom pool villa with daily breakfast, your choice of daily a la carte lunch, dinner or a 45-minute massage each, daily mini-bar refills, a cocktail or mocktail each, return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Banjar Kelod, Anyar, Jl. Raya Bumbak No.88A, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Ultra-Chic Canggu Rice Paddy Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner, Massages & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Look out onto sweeping views of emerald-green rice fields, only minutes from the island's trendiest cafes and beach clubs, at this tranquil retreat. This soothing haven boasts a sparkling infinity pool framed by rolling green hills and the tranquillity of Svaha Spa, where you can relax and recharge with specialised therapies. Savour a balance of sweet, salty and spicy flavours at Paed Thai Canggu or swirl your fork in a hearty bowl of pasta at Cantina Classe - all without leaving the resort.

Take advantage of the resort's facilities, or venture out to Canggu and embrace the essence of island living. Eat your way through the myriad of restaurants, cafes and boutique bars or marvel at golden sunsets in this laidback area.
location_description: Astera Luxury Resort & Spa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Canggu Padang Linjong No.8x, Canggu, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Private Pool Villas near Ultra-Cool Canggu with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Set amid lush rice paddies you’ll find the luxurious The Kryamaha Villas - an exclusive tropical haven of expansive villas with private pools, fringed with tropical greenery. Fusing traditional Balinese stylings with modern luxuries, each villa has an expansive courtyard with an in-ground private pool, a spacious day bed to catch up on some well-deserved relaxation and wide open doors that allow the balmy breeze to flow in.

With local and international delicacies on offer at The Uma Restaurant and a menu of relaxing treatments available at The Jiva Spa, it's easy to spend your entire stay in these lavish surroundings. Venture beyond the walls of your private villa and you'll find the white waves and trendy shops and cafes of Canggu just a 20-minute drive away. For a more relaxed beach day catch one of the resort's shuttles to Pantai Nyanyi where you can sunbathe, swim and watch a golden sunset.
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Nyanyi, Desa Beraban, Tabanan, Bali, Indonesia 80361

title: Group Private Pool Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast Plus Daily Lunch, Dinner or a Massage
description: Immerse yourself in an unexpected Eden of green as you’re lured to Umalas, a stone's throw from Bali’s Bohemian hideaway in Canggu. Leave the traditional hustle and bustle behind for an authentic Balinese experience at The Santai Umalas, a collection of pristine private pool villas with 24-hour butler service set amid lush rice paddies and temples - just a 15-minute drive from the bright lights of Seminyak or Canggu. Kick back with friends or family staying in a spacious two or three-bedroom pool villa with daily à la carte breakfast, your choice of daily à la carte lunch, dinner or a 45-minute massage each, daily replenished non-alcoholic mini bar, a signature cocktail or mocktail each, private return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Banjar Kelod, Anyar, Jl. Raya Bumbak No.88A, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Canggu Villa Escape with Daily Dining & Drinks
description: Unwind amid verdant tropical gardens and paddy fields, staying in a traditional Indonesian villa at Plataran Canggu Bali. Want for nothing with authentic Indonesian dining, a serene spa and two glittering swimming pools at your fingertips, plus a host of boutiques and eateries just a short walk away. Your escape includes daily breakfast, your choice of two-course lunch or dinner daily, a cocktail per person, per day, daily afternoon tea and convenient private return airport transfers from Bali’s Denpasar Airport.
offer_address: Jalan Pengubugan Banjar, Jl. Silayukti, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Grand Opening: Bali Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Massages
description:
Succumb to the tropical state of mind at this oasis just moments from the striking black sands and world-renowned surf breaks of Echo Beach. Each spacious suite exudes romance with sprawling stand-alone bathtubs, while high-walled, private pool villas offer seclusion amid the lively town. 

With breakfast delivered to your suite or villa every sun-drenched morning and cocktails stirred and shaken in abundance, this is Balinese bliss at its finest.

Take in breathtaking views of swaying palms and crashing waves from the rooftop infinity pool - a perfect spot for basking in the sun or watching postcard-perfect sunsets - or centring your mind with a yoga session. 

Spend your days cocktail-sipping at surrounding beach clubs, riding through the cafe-dotted streets or uncovering the tranquil rice fields of Canggu.
location_description: Atap Resort Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: 88 Jalan Munduk Kedungu, Pererenan, Mengwi, Canggu, Badung 80351, Bali

title: Private Pool Villa with 24-Hour Butler Service and Daily Dining
description: Escape to a private tropical paradise and holiday at your own pace at the all-pool Aradhana Villas. Located in a previously hidden corner of Bali in Canggu, just minutes from Finns Beach Club and Café Del Mar, the resort's beautiful pool villas are perfectly designed for you to make the most out of your stay. An ultra-relaxing getaway that comes with the comforts of home and five-star luxury, Aradhana is a haven of quiet intimacy and sophistication. Includes daily breakfast in your villa, your choice of daily lunch or dinner, one blissful Balinese massage each, daily afternoon high tea, round-the-clock butler service, return airport transfers, complimentary minibar treats on arrival and more for two.
offer_address: Jl. Pemelisan Agung, Canggu, Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia

title: Secluded Canggu Villa with Daily Breakfast & Bucket of Beers
description: Discover the tranquil seclusion of Teratai Villa Canggu, a boutique collection of private pool villas in the peaceful neighbourhood of Canggu. Boasting a seamless blend of Japanese and Balinese design that marries comfort and space, this home-away-from-home is the perfect tropical retreat. Start your morning with a refreshing dip in your private pool or indulge in a unique floating breakfast before heading to the endless beaches, quaint cafes and lively beach clubs nearby.
offer_address: Jl. Kayu Tulang Gang Teratai 8, Canggu, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Canggu Self-Contained Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Three Lunches or Dinners & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Kickstart your Bali adventures with a retreat to this collection of private pool villas, situated in the vibrant neighbourhood of Canggu. Embrace the allure of this central location by embarking on a bar-hopping escapade, commencing at the bustling Black Sand Brewery and continuing to the renowned Old Man's Bar. 

Start your day with a revitalising plunge in your secluded pool or pamper yourself before exploring the nearby pristine beaches, charming cafes and vibrant beach clubs.

When it's time to kick on, head to Melasti Beach where Tropical Temptation Beach Club invites you to join in the tribal vibe with free entry included in your package. Sip on a signature cocktail as you enter and gaze out upon white sands and turquoise waters while soaking in live DJ sets and an invigorating ambience.
offer_address: Jl. Kayu Tulang Gang Teratai 8, Canggu, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Bali Ultra-Chic Canggu Rice Paddy Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Dinner, Nightly Cocktails & Pool Villa Upgrades Available
description:

This soothing haven boasts a sparkling infinity pool framed by rolling green hills and the tranquillity of Svaha Spa, where you can relax and recharge with specialised therapies. Savour a balance of sweet, salty and spicy flavours at Paed Thai Cuisine or swirl your fork in a hearty bowl of pasta at Cantina Classe - all without leaving the resort.

Take advantage of the resort's facilities, or venture out to Canggu and embrace the essence of island living. Eat your way through the myriad of restaurants, cafes and boutique bars or marvel at golden sunsets in this laidback area.
location_description: Astera Luxury Resort & Spa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Canggu Padang Linjong No.8x, Canggu, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Canggu Cabana Resort by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Canggu All-Suite Indulgence with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Free-flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Discover secluded bliss at this beachside five-star oasis, a sparkling new suite collection located just moments from some of Canggu’s hottest spots, including The Lawn and Old Man day clubs, as well as many of the region's legendary dining experiences.

Return to moments of laidback luxury in your ultra-modern, designer suite, masterfully thought out to offer sweeping views over lush gardens, Canggu’s riverside or the endlessly shining Indian Ocean, perfect for savouring Bali's famous sunsets.

Backed by a wealth of luxe inclusions - including massages, beach club access, nightly free-flow cocktails and dine-around credit to spend at one of 10 'Wonder Space' restaurants - this is the quintessential Bali escape.

Begin each morning with a dip in the gently curving infinity pool or zen-inducing yoga on the resort’s rooftop, or head to the resort’s wellness centre, Svaha Spa Nelayan, for massages and holistic treatments backed by timeless tradition.
location_description: Canggu Cabana Resort & Spa by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Nelayan No.888A, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Canggu Escape with Daily Gourmet Dining
description:
Embrace the tranquil atmosphere and sun-kissed culture of Canggu at the boutique Hotel Tugu Bali, a unique art hotel nestled amid rice paddies and lush gardens. Experience the ultimate escape just a stroll from the white sands of Batu Bolong Beach with daily à la carte breakfast and dinner, daily poolside high tea, one 60-minute massage per adult, return private transfers from Ngurah Rai International Airport and a welcome cocktail, glass of wine, beer, juice or smoothie each on arrival.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Pantai Canggu, Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie
title: Modern Canggu Tropical Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Slip into the laid-back rhythm of Bali with a stay in a dreamy private pool villa, nestled in the lush heart of Canggu, where barefoot beach clubs, artisan cafes and bohemian boutiques await. This tranquil retreat offers the perfect balance of seclusion and island excitement.

Relax in your spacious villa and lounge by your sun-kissed pool, surrounded by swaying palm trees and cosy sunbeds. Experience the full charm of Bali without leaving the resort: savour delicious meals in the comfort of your villa, and watch the sunset with a refreshing signature cocktail as the warm island breeze melts your worries away.
location_description: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Gg. Anggrek VI No.8A, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Canggu Romantic Private Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Three-Course Dinner Experience, Butler Service & Daily Cocktails
description:
Discover one of Canggu’s best-kept secrets: Ametis Villa, an intimate collection of secluded, romantic private pool villas in the heart of Bali’s cherished surfer’s paradise. Elevating traditional Balinese design with countless luxury touches, each villa is unbelievably spacious (minimum 350sqm) and backed by the resort’s unrivalled hospitality - including butler service, wellness treatments inspired by ancient rituals and a complimentary driver’s service in Canggu and Seminyak. You’ll also have easy access to one of Canggu’s most celebrated restaurants, Billy Ho - renowned celebrity chef Will Meyrick’s house of late-night bites, specialising in ferociously creative cocktails and sharing plates inspired by the extraordinary flavours of East Asia.

Start your morning with a refreshing dip in your magnificent private pool - or realign your chakras with a trip to the famed nearby yoga studio, The Practice, before heading to the endless nearby beaches, Melbourne-inspired cafes and lively beach clubs that have made Canggu the place to be.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Batu Bolong, Canggu, Bali, Indonesia

title: Serene Five-Star Art-Inspired Canggu Suites with Decadent Dining & Massages
description:
Nestled on the southwest coast of Bali, on the pristine shores of Echo Beach in up-and-coming Canggu, you’ll find the boutique Hotel Tugu Bali. This unique, art-inspired beachfront retreat is filled with a world-class collection of museum-quality antiquities and blessed with uninterrupted views over the Indian Ocean.

Surrounded by private gardens, within easy reach of Canggu’s stylish bars, restaurants and shops, this boutique gem is a one-of-a-kind destination where creativity, luxury and tranquility blissfully merge. Follow the artful timber paths to reach the flower-filled garden, where an impressive pool with sweeping ocean views awaits. Let serenity find you at the spa - or maybe discover your inner warrior with the hotel's yoga and meditation classes. When you’re ready to unwind, Hotel Tugu Bali’s luxurious suites - brimming with character and unique timber interiors - are waiting for you, while the five onsite restaurants will take you on a culinary journey through Indonesian, Chinese and Japanese fare,
offer_address: Pantai Batu Bolong St, Canggu, North Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

You’ll be just moments from some of Canggu’s hottest spots, including The Lawn and Old Man day clubs, as well as the region's legendary dining experiences. Backed by a wealth of classic inclusions - including massages, beach club access, nightly free-flow cocktails and dine-around credit to spend at one of 10 'Wonder Space' restaurants - this is the quintessential Bali escape. description:
Discover the quintessential Bali escape at this laidback boutique resort, perfectly placed between stylish cafes, happening beach clubs and the warm sands of Nelayan Beach. Surrounded by rainforest foliage and featuring eclectic designer flourishes in bamboo, polished cement and teak, there’s no finer place to discover Canggu’s best.

ZIN Canggu Resort & Villas has everything you need to kick back in paradise, including relaxed brunch spot and onsite coffee roastery ZIN Cafe and ZINFIT, one of the island’s finest cycling and fitness studios.

Spend your days savouring Canggu’s beloved beach clubs - mainstays FINNS Beach Club, Old Man’s and The Lawn Canggu are all within easy reach - and return to a spectacular central pool, tropical cocktails and plenty of fun in the sun.

vendor_name: Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection
title: Five-Star Canggu Suite Escape
description:
Immerse yourself in Canggu's serenity with a stay at the luxe Haven Suites Bali Berawa, located on the shores of tranquil Berawa Beach. This all-suite oceanfront oasis takes you far away from the hustle and bustle of the island’s touristy destinations, allowing you to experience a more authentic side of Bali. When you're not relaxing on the beach, check out Canggu's restaurants, the famous nearby Tanah Lot temple, hit the surf or visit Atlas Beach Club.

Surrounded by fragrant gardens and beautifully decorated with traditional décor, this beachfront resort boasts a long list of excellent facilities that will make your stay even more blissful. Splash in the sparkling pool, work out at the state-of-the-art gym, indulge in decadent dining at the stylish Ketumbar Bistro & Bar or pamper your body and soul at the spa.
offer_address: Banjar Berawa, Jl. Pemelisan Agung, Tibubeneng, North Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Canggu Beachfront Suites with Waterfront Infinity Pool
description:
Perched on the sands of Berawa Beach in chic Canggu, LV8 Resort Hotel is perfectly placed for every type of Bali holiday - honeymooners will find privacy in romantic restaurants, families can safely frolic in the sand and friends will love hopping between beach bars and boutiques, all within walking distance.

Suites are designed with space in mind, with expansive living areas, buckets of natural light and all the mod-cons required for a stress-free stay. Waltz down to the waterfront infinity pool to spend your days soaking up the sunshine, or take to the waves for a surf lesson or two. Dine and drink at Vue Beach Club from sun up until well past sundown, working your way through the curated cocktail list and extensive lunch and dinner menus full of local and international flavours.
offer_address: Canggu, Jl. Pantai Berawa No.100xx, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung Bali 80361 Indonesia

vendor_name: Canggu Cabana Resort by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Beachfront Canggu Suite Escape with Restaurant & Spa
description: Discover bliss at this boutique five-star beachfront Canggu oasis. You’ll be just moments from some of Canggu’s hottest spots, including The Lawn and Old Man day clubs, as well as the region's legendary dining experiences. Begin each morning with a dip in the gently curving infinity pool, dine at Seabird Restaurant or head to the resort’s wellness centre, Svaha Spa Nelayan, for massages and holistic treatments backed by timeless tradition.
location_description: Canggu Cabana Resort & Spa by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Nelayan No.888A, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Romantic Balinese Villa in the Heart of Canggu with Private Pool
description: Amp up the romance when you escape to Manca Villa in the beach-chic town of Canggu on Bali's south coast. It's all too easy to forget the rest of the world and while away the days splashing about in your private swimming pool, enjoying fresh fruits out on your alfresco dining area or indulging in a private dinner for two that's been sprinkled with rose petals. When you're ready to venture outside, the beach clubs, restaurants and cafes of Canggu are at your fingertips.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Berawa Gg Kresna No 8 Canggu, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Boutique Beachfront Art-Inspired Canggu Escape
description: Positioned on the southwest shores of Batu Bolong Beach in the popular Canggu, you’ll find the boutique Hotel Tugu Bali, a unique art-inspired retreat filled with a world-class collection of museum-quality antiquities and blessed with one of the island's most stunning sunsets. Surrounded by private gardens - within easy reach of Canggu’s stylish bars, restaurants and shops - this boutique gem is a one-of-a-kind destination where creativity, luxury and tranquillity blissfully merge. When you’re ready to unwind, Hotel Tugu Bali’s luxurious suites - brimming with character and unique timber interiors - are waiting for you, while the onsite restaurants will take you on a culinary journey through Indonesian, Chinese and Japanese fare.
offer_address: Pantai Batu Bolong St, Canggu, North Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection
title: Five-Star Bali All-Suite Retreat Seconds from Berawa Beach
description: Authentic Balinese beachfront luxury awaits at five-star Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection, overlooking the crashing waves of the Indian Ocean. Choose your preferred style of relaxation -  will it be on the sand by the turquoise ocean, in the shallows of the infinity pool or with a serene spa treatment? Treat your tastebuds to a crisp, cool cocktail as you watch the sun set in a blaze of gold, followed by a dinner showcasing local flavours at Ketumbar Bistro & Bar.
location_description: Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection
offer_address: Jl. Pemelisan Agung, Banjar Berawa, Desa Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara 80361 Bali, Indonesia

title: Stylish Secluded Bali Villa with Private Pool
description: Discover the tranquil seclusion of Teratai Villa Canggu, a boutique selection of private pool villas in the tropical neighbourhood of Canggu. Feel at ease surrounded by the seemless blend of Japanese and Balinese design in this home-away-from-home that you will never want to leave. Spend your mornings lounging on the day bed and indulging in a refreshing floating breakfast before heading to the lively beaches, stylish cafes and pumping beach clubs nearby.
offer_address: Jl. Kayu Tulang Gang Teratai 8, Canggu, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Canggu Five-Star Laidback Beachfront Luxury with Ultra-Cool Beach Club
description: For the laidback traveller looking for a splash of luxury, the world-class COMO Uma Canggu breaks the mould for breathtaking escapes. Spend balmy days at the sleek and sophisticated COMO Beach Club, where Indian Ocean panoramas are the backdrop to barrel-aged cocktails, poolside dining, live music, DJ sets and daybeds. For a touch of pampering, float over to Shambhala spa for Balinese treatments and steam rooms that are guaranteed to invigorate body and soul.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Batu Mejan, Echo Beach, Canggu, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Spacious Canggu Five-Bedroom Private Villa Bliss with 38-Metre Pool & Swim-Up Bar
description: There's private villas, and then there's this incredible five-bedroom estate right in the heart of Bali's Canggu. Experience the best of both worlds: an ultimate sanctuary of calm and luxury, tucked away in serene tropical gardens, but also just moments from vibrant local markets, eclectic boutiques and world-class dining venues. Unwind in the spacious outdoor terrace and take a refreshing dip in your private pool, complete with a swim-up bar so you can raise a toast to your holiday.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Semat No.4, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali

title: Five-Star Bali Pool Villas near Canggu
description:
Immerse yourself in an unexpected Eden amid the lush greenery at The Santai by LifestyleRetreats, a stone's throw from Bali's bohemian Canggu. Leave the hustle and bustle behind for an authentic Balinese experience at this five-star collection of pristine private pool villas with 24-hour butler service, set amid lush rice paddies and temples - just a 15-minute drive from the bright lights of Seminyak. Escape with family and friends and stay in a two-bedroom villa for four or a three-bedroom villa for six.

The perfect balance of relaxation and adrenaline-worthy waves (the area, and Canggu specifically, are home to some of the best surf breaks in Bali), The Santai by LifestyleRetreats promises a tranquil villa retreat that fuses Asian cuisine, relaxing massage treatments, irresistible signature cocktails and carefree, sun-kissed days lounging by your private pool.
offer_address: Banjar Kelod, Anyar, Jl. Bumbak No.88A, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Idyllic Canggu Self-Contained Beachfront Suites & Villas with Rooftop Pool & Three Restaurants
description:
Just a short stroll from the mesmerizing shores of Canggu’s famed Berewa Beach, an opulent haven awaits, where beachfront living is elevated to an art form. Step into your exclusive private suite or villa and leave the world behind. Each accommodation offers a harmonious fusion of sleek modern design and timeless Balinese elegance, creating an ambience of unrivalled sophistication.

Indulge in the ultimate luxury with a bespoke in-suite massage or retreat to the state-of-the-art fitness centre, complete with a lavish indoor jacuzzi and rejuvenating sauna. After a day of blissful relaxation, ascend to the rooftop infinity pool at the prestigious Secana Pool Club, where you can sip on handcrafted cocktails while the sun melts into the horizon. With three restaurants at your disposal, savour exquisite cuisine as the radiant colours of the ocean sunset creates the perfect backdrop for an unforgettable evening.
offer_address: Jalan Pemelisan Agung, Pantai Berawa, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali: Generous Three-Bedroom Family Villas in Canggu with Private Pool & Sun Terrace
description: Experience the epitome of laidback Canggu living in a stunning private residence in the heart of Berawa, the epicentre of Bali's surf, dining and shopping scene. Each curated three-bedroom home is a masterpiece of design, with spacious living areas, fully equipped kitchens and private pools. Savour vibrant local flavours in nearby restaurants, explore the cultural treasures of Ubud, take a scenic drive to the majestic Mount Batur, or simply relax in your private sanctuary.
offer_address: Komplek Mandala 8 Estate, Jl. Raya Semat No.4, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361

title: Canggu Bali Villa Luxury with Marble Infinity Pool
description: Escape to a romantic villa retreat overlooking emerald-green rice fields at the charming Astera Luxury Resort & Spa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality. Nestled in southwest Bali, this soothing haven is framed by lush foliage and rolling green hills. Float in the tranquil marble infinity pool overlooking the serene horizon, indulge in traditional massage treatments while relishing beautiful natural landscapes at Svaha Spa, or savour dazzling dishes served in the comfort of your private villa.
location_description: Astera Luxury Resort & Spa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Canggu Padang Linjong No.8x, Canggu, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie
title: Ayona Villa Canggu- LPC & LE+- NOV 24
description: x
location_description: Ayona Villa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Gg. Anggrek VI No.8A, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Romantic Bali Resort Villa with Pool & Daily Breakfast
description: In the heart of Canggu, Aeera Villa offers a picturesque and romantic residence framed by lush rice paddies. Awaken at your leisure to board waves at Berawa Beach before returning for floating breakfast in the pool. Explore cool cafes and trendy boutiques along Jalan Pantai Batu Bolong, or enjoy a romantic meal at a refined restaurant. You'll have plenty of time to greet the sunset in style, admiring coastal vistas with a cool cocktail before returning to your oh-so-private abode.
offer_address: Gg. Semar No.8, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Canggu Beachfront Elegance with Six Dining Venues & Spa
description:
Located on the shores of central Canggu, this elegant retreat is ideally positioned for tranquil beach days, shopping and nightlife. Savour international flavours at the hotel's six restaurants and bars, including Cure, helmed by celebrity chef Andrew Walsh.

Sip on a refreshing cocktail in a private cabana by the infinity pool, look out at the boundless Indian Ocean and indulge in lavish spa treatments at Regent Spa & Wellness. Venture out to explore the nearby Tanah Lot Temple, a stunning sea temple perched on a rocky outcrop, or browse the eclectic boutiques of Seminyak, just a short drive away.
location_description: Regent Bali Canggu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jl.Pantai Batu Bolong No.93xx Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Relaxed Bali Escape Just Five Minutes from Canggu Beach with Fusion Restaurant, Rooftop Infinity Pool & Bar
description: Experience the laidback charm of Denpasar's hippest beach town with a stay at Holiday Inn Resort Bali Canggu, an IHG Hotel. Positioned within an easy stroll of Echo Beach's legendary surf breaks, this family-friendly retreat offers a base to discover vibrant street art, organic cafes and boutiques. Return to the hotel for a refreshing dip in the pool, savour all-day fusion dining at Roomah Restaurant or enjoy a delicious cocktail at the rooftop bar as the sun sets over the ocean.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Bali Canggu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Batu Bolong A. No. 93XX, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung, 80361, Bali
